org.argus.sms.app.fragment

Class FragmentReportMonthly

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.argus.sms.app.fragment.AbstractFragment
      • org.argus.sms.app.fragment.AbstractFragmentSend
        • org.argus.sms.app.fragment.AbstractFragmentReport
          • org.argus.sms.app.fragment.FragmentReportMonthly
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.app.LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<Cursor>

    public class FragmentReportMonthly
extends AbstractFragmentReport
    Report Monthly Fragment. Specific for a month report

    This class inherit and overrides methods from AbstractFragmentReport and from AbstractFragmentSend

    Created by Olivier Goutet. Openium 2014
